title: CloudOS
heading: A Simple Web-based Terminal
content: CloudOS is a simple web-based terminal made by clantum studios to provide a terminal like experience to people on the web!
content2: This terminal is made to replicate the look of a real terminal. its a combination of cmd and ubuntu's terminal, making it look very nice. go give it a try now!

title: GalaxyOS
heading: A simple and functional WebOS.
content: GalaxyOS (formerly QuantumOS) is a functional WebOS powered by the PlutoOS core.
content2: This OS is made to replicate a desktop experience on the web that normal users would get as an actual os. Go try it out now!
